title: BDD100K 5classes  got bad map
body:
dataset 8000train    1000val 5classes car bus truck bike motor 
model tiny-yolo3
batchsize 64 
accomulate 1
This is my result.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43692998/68639560-e3bb4180-053f-11ea-9c3f-4713d0132a21.png)
detect result（best.pt）

Also,I trained the same dataset by yolov3, print the AP of every category, I found the AP of bike and motor is bad,how can I fix it. (the data of bike and motor is much less than others in BDD100K)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43692998/68662169-42e87880-0577-11ea-9548-fef0e1ef763c.png)

Thank you！ I am looking forward to your reply.
